name: Samba Dance Dress
description:
Get early access to build and test build, be able to try all epochs and test them by yourself on Patreon or contact me for support on Discord

To support me you can buy me a coffe at https://ko-fi.com/antonioriolo

Training settings:

33 images, 15 steps, 10 epochs, you find many epochs (with test images using plot xy script) on my Patreon while supporting me.


Recommended settings:

  • Make sure you are aware on the usage instructions of LORA

  • Sampler: DPM++ SDE Karras (Recommended for best quality, you may try other samplers)

  • CFG Scale : 5 to 9

  • LORA weight for txt2img: reccomended 0.5

  • Keys: wearing samba dance dress, carnival party

This model has average difficulty to be used. You just have to play with weights to get what you want. You might want to give a weight to the keyword wearing samba dress dance, 1.2 or 1.3 might be good.

Also you might want to give a weight to the dress color, since it usually draw it in yellow and green.

Example "woman, (wearing samba dress dance:1.2), (red dress:1.2), etc"

carnival keyword doesn't always work, also in this case you might want to give an higher weight to make your woman inside a carnival party, but in most of the cases i tryied it wasn't necessary. carnival or carnival party both should work.

If you'd like to support my efforts and have access to early and bleeding edge builds, please think about joining my Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/betterCuteAsians
